alert.note: Alert for Central Carbon County; Southwest Carbon County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 24 at 3:16AM MST until December 24 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HEAVY SNOW EXPECTED FOR THE MOUNTAINS TODAY THROUGH EARLY THIS WEEKEND... ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Southwest Carbon County to include Dixon...Baggs and Dad. Central Carbon County including Rawlins. * WHEN...Until 5 AM Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause poor visibility in blowing snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Carbon County; Southwest Carbon County
